content:
Some input search boxes does not have the close(cross) button while some input search boxes has that cross button. The close button is very useful to close the input box and clearing the text from the input box in just one click.
My proposal is to add that close button to every possible input search boxes. If you grant me the permission for this feature I will start working on this.
For more clear picture of this feature this is the visual image of it: close_btn.jpg
Close button is not available in search boxes of Settings < Uploaded Files, Alert words, Muted topics and many more. no_close_btn.jpg
Also Is there any need to open an issue for it ?
I don't see any reason we shouldn't have it. I would say go ahead and work on it. Maybe there is some sort of refactor you can do to simply the process of adding a search box with cross.

Nikhil Maske (nikhilmaske-2001) said:

Also Is there any need to open an issue for it ?

This is just enough work that it's worth tracking. I opened https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/17263 and assigned it to @Nikhil Maske (nikhilmaske-2001). This will definitely be a nice detail to clean up.
@Steve Howell (showell) PR #17682 is ready for review. Please take a look.
@Tim Abbott PR #17682 is ready for review. Please take a look on it.

@Nikhil Maske (nikhilmaske-2001) can you comment in the PR on how you tested this PR?

And actually maybe we should also recruit someone else to check out the PR and test all of the widgets you converted -- I think that's most of the review work here and I don't think I have much comparative advantage on it.

I have fetched the branch locally with the changes @Nikhil Maske (nikhilmaske-2001) has made to review the buttons on my localhost. I have manually tested each button and they are working as expected.
Thanks you @Smit Patel for testing. @Tim Abbott I have put all the necessary information in the decription of the PR #17772. Please take a look.
Tim you saw/reviewed my old PR, that was intentionally closed. #17772 is the new PR that is tested by Smit and ready for your review.
@Tim Abbott A gentle ping, maybe you miss checking my PR #17772

PR #19578 for issue #17263 is failing at some node tests (https://github.com/zulip/zulip/runs/3418591868). I tried reading the error log but I am not able to understand it, any guidance over it would be appreciable. (CC: @Sahil Batra )
@Nikhil Maske (nikhilmaske-2001) I think Sahil Batra posted a review; he's probably the best person to help with this sort of issue in any case.
Yes, I am looking into it already.
PR #19578 is ready for final review. @Tim Abbott Can you review it ?
